item.title: About
item.description: You can find everything about what we are doing right now, FOLLOWING US on social media!!! To make a better community and to expand!! Remember we, 0xbuilders would like to take new ideas and we are not the best, we just like to share knowledge for free, so if you want to give us feedback, you can do it on discord or by gmail!! Also, do not forgot that we encourage you to take a step and build your own path, so any questions are welcome, as well as new posts!
